name: Neck Retraction (Chin Tucks)
description: Gently draw your chin back while keeping your eyes level. Hold for 5 seconds. This strengthens deep neck flexors and improves posture.

name: Neck Flexion Stretch
description: Slowly lower your chin toward your chest until you feel a gentle stretch in the back of your neck. Hold for 15-30 seconds.

name: Neck Extension Stretch
description: Gently tilt your head backward, looking up at the ceiling. Hold when you feel a stretch in the front of your neck.

name: Lateral Neck Flexion (Side Bending)
description: Slowly tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. Hold for 15-30 seconds on each side.

name: Neck Rotation
description: Slowly turn your head to look over one shoulder, then the other. Hold at the end range for 5-10 seconds.

name: Isometric Neck Exercises
description: Place your hand against your head and push gently while resisting with your neck muscles. Hold for 5-10 seconds. Perform in all directions (forward, backward, sides).

name: Upper Trapezius Stretch
description: Tilt your head to one side while gently pulling down on the opposite shoulder. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Levator Scapulae Stretch
description: Turn your head 45 degrees to one side and look down. Place the hand on the same side on top of your head and gently pull down. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Shoulder Blade Squeeze
description: Pull your shoulder blades back and together, as if trying to squeeze a pencil between them. Hold for 5-10 seconds.

name: Wall Angels
description: Stand with your back against a wall, arms at 90 degrees. Slowly raise and lower your arms while maintaining contact with the wall.

name: Neck Circles
description: Gently roll your head in a circular motion, first clockwise then counterclockwise. Move slowly and smoothly.

name: Resistance Band Neck Strengthening
description: Using a resistance band around your head, perform controlled movements against resistance in all directions.

name: Prone Y-T-W Raises
description: Lying face down, raise your arms to form Y, T, and W positions. Hold each for 2-3 seconds.

name: Deep Neck Flexor Strengthening
description: Lying on your back, lift your head slightly off the ground while keeping your chin tucked. Hold for 5-10 seconds.

name: Scalene Stretch
description: Tilt your head to one side while rotating slightly away. Place opposite hand on your chest and pull down gently. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Neck Bridge
description: Advanced exercise: Lying on your back, support your body weight on your head and feet, creating a bridge. Hold for 10-30 seconds.

name: Pendulum Neck Exercise
description: Let your head hang forward in a relaxed position. Gently swing it side to side like a pendulum.

name: Towel Neck Stretch
description: Place a towel around the back of your neck, holding ends in front. Gently pull forward while extending your neck back.

name: Corner Pec Stretch
description: Stand in a corner with arms on walls at 90 degrees. Lean forward to stretch chest and front neck muscles.

name: Neural Glides
description: Gentle movements to mobilize nerves: tilt head away while extending arm down, then reverse. Move smoothly without holding.
